HELP_TEXT.alwaysDash: If on, always dash even without holding dash button.
HELP_TEXT.commandRemember: Remembers what was selected in battle.
HELP_TEXT.bgmVolume: This changes the volume of bg music.
HELP_TEXT.bgsVolume: This changes the volume of bg sound.
HELP_TEXT.meVolume: This changes the volume of message sound effects.
HELP_TEXT.seVolume: This changes the volume of sound effects.
HELP_TEXT.switch_351: Causes Red Orbs to stop giving free healing.
HELP_TEXT.variable_18: The amount of fun you'll have while playing.
